description: This table contains outpatient adjudication information from the Image Database (IMD) master file.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with outpatient adjudication information.

columns.name: REIMBURSEMENT_RATE
columns.description: The reimbursement rate percentage expressed as a decimal for outpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: HCPCS_PAYABLE_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for the claim Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) payable amount for outpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: CLAIM_ESRD_PAY_AMT
columns.description: End stage renal disease (ESRD) payment amount for outpatient adjudication info.

columns.name: OUT_NONPAY_PRF_AMT
columns.description: Monetary amount for outpatient adjudication nonpayable professional component.
